      • Server

        public Server(int port,
              boolean enableExtensions,
              ServerTUI view)
       throws java.io.IOException
        Server constructor.
        Parameters:
        port - Port to bind the connection listener to
        enableExtensions - Whether to enable extensions (currently larger board, winning length supported)
        view - View to use
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

                          throws java.io.IOException

      • initConnection

        public void initConnection(java.net.Socket socket)
        Initiates a connection to the given socket, e.g. starts a handler for this socket and sends the initial server message. Starts timeout in handler for handshake from client.
        Parameters:
        socket - A socket

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable o,
                   java.lang.Object arg)
        Update method used by the ClientHandler to indicate a client has responded with its capabilities and it is useful to add this information to the server. Only does this when the client concerned is not already associated with a created player.
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer

      • initPlayer

        private void initPlayer(ClientHandler handler,
                        ClientCapabilitiesStruct caps)
        Creates a player and stores relevant data (player, handler and capabilities). Calls matchplayer to see if the new player would allow a game to be started according to its criteria.
        Parameters:
        handler - ClientHandler for this player/client
        caps - Capabilities of this player/client

      • matchPlayers

        private void matchPlayers(Player player)
        Checks if the given player would allow a game to be started. Current implementation is very basic, just starts a game between the first to players connected.
        Parameters:
        player - Player to match

      • determineRules

        private GameRulesStruct determineRules(java.util.List<Player> players)
        Determines the lowest common divisor of rules between players and the server.
        Parameters:
        players - List of players
        Returns:
        Most extended rule set supported by all players, server

      • compareDims

        private int compareDims(int dim1,
                        int dim2)
        Compares two dimensions, according to the protocol dim==0 stands for infinity.
        Parameters:
        dim1 - First dimension
        dim2 - Second dimension
        Returns:
        'Greatest' dimension

      • startGame

        private void startGame(java.util.List<Player> players,
                       GameRulesStruct rules)
        Starts a new game thread with given rules for the given players. Removes all relevant player data from the server and hands it to the GameThread. Updates parent variables for the ClientHandlers.
        Parameters:
        players - List of players
        rules - Rules for given players, server

      • removeClient

        public void removeClient(ClientHandler client)
        Removes all data associated with this ClientHandler's player from this server's variables.
        Parameters:
        client - A ClientHandler
